definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: We need light, innovators, and creative people to get us through our energy crisis.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要光明，創新者和創意分子來挽救能源危機。

sentences.english: How did the monstropolis end its energy crisis?
sentences.chinese: 怪獸城的能源危機是如何解決的？

sentences.english: So we have an energy crisis. a real energy crisis.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們有能源危機，一場真正的危機。

sentences.english: They scrimp on oil as much as they can during the energy crisis .
sentences.chinese: 他們在能源危機時期儘量節省汽油。

sentences.english: However, Botswana’s diversification strategy is threatened by an energy crisis.
sentences.chinese: 然而，博茨瓦納的多元化戰略受到了能源危機的影響。
